summary: A book which tells of how Dunmer innkeeper Jandar Eilra came to learn of the events in the Dawn Era
descriptionHtml:
[u][i][b][size=6]About:
[/size][/b][/i][/u][size=6][size=3]A book which tells of how Dunmer innkeeper Jandar Eilra came to learn of the events in the Dawn Era [/size][/size][u][i][b][size=6]
Where is it?
[/size][/b][/i][/u]In The Arcaneum of the college of winterhold.

[size=6][u][i][b]Installation[/b][/i][/u][/size]

Use your mod organiser or extract to Data folder.

[b][i][u][size=6]Credits:
[/size][/u][/i][/b]Thank you to the UESP

Also I might do more mods like this let me know of any suggestions you may have.
author: MorpheusArch
